allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "feat\(orchestrator\): create TradingOrchestrator class for #60" --body "## Summary

Created a new TradingOrchestrator class that handles scanning and hedge fund orchestration, delegating all execution to ExecutionEngine. This is a clean replacement for the monolithic Trader class without the execution logic.

## Changes

- New: Created src/alpacalyzer/orchestrator.py with:
  - TradingOrchestrator class with clean separation of concerns
  - scan\(\) method using OpportunityAggregator
  - analyze\(\) method calling hedge fund agents
  - execute\(\) method feeding signals to ExecutionEngine
  - run_cycle\(\) for full pipeline execution
  - Support for analyze_mode flag
  - Support for direct_tickers for manual ticker input
  - Support for agent selection \(ALL, TRADE, INVEST\)
  - Cooldown management for exited tickers

- Tests: Created tests/test_orchestrator.py with 22 tests covering:
  - Initialization with various configurations
  - Scan behavior \(with/without direct tickers\)
  - Analysis with hedge fund agents
  - Execution through ExecutionEngine
  - Full pipeline cycle
  - Cooldown management

## Test Plan

- All 22 orchestrator tests pass
- Full test suite passes \(498 passed, 3 skipped\)
- Linting passes \(ruff check & format\)
- Type checking passes")
